title: Hardware 2FA
description: A hardware-based TOTP generator using ESP32, with OLED display and web-based config.

title: Smart Eye
description: Compact system using Raspberry Pi to assist visually impaired with image description and audio output.

title: Entity Value Extraction
description: Extracts entity values from product images using OCR and NER with OpenCV, PIL, spaCy, and multiprocessing.

title: Ethernet Toggler
description: A lightweight Python app to toggle Ethernet connection directly from the system tray with one-click functionality.

title: Sports Classification and Pose Estimation
description: Classifying sports activities using YOLOv5 and performing pose estimation on video data.
